home.text: Upload a point cloud or a mesh file in Files -> Load Cloud to view and process it.

warning.cloud-not-loaded: Please, upload a cloud to perform this action.
warning.mesh-not-loaded: Please, run the primitivation to generate a mesh to perform this action.

first-step.title: First Step
first-step.description: Let's start the tour by te main page!

second-step.title: Files Tab
second-step.description: So right here you have the tabs where you can navigate through it. Starting with the files tab, here you will find the functionalities of:

third-step.title: Load Cloud
third-step.description: Each tab has some buttons whose functionality is described in the guide. If you already know the functions that each tab present, you can go straight to step 7 by clicking the button below.

fourth-step.title: Pre-processing Tab
fourth-step.description: This tab presents all cloud pre-processing functions as:

fifth-step.title: Processing Tab
fifth-step.description: The processing tab one shows the Efficient Ransac function.

sixth-step.title: Helps Tab
sixth-step.description: This tab brings the functions of:

seventh-step.title: Account Tab
seventh-step.description: The last one presents the logout functionality.

eighth-step.title: Potree Viewer
eighth-step.description: Right here the viewer will be displayed when the cloud is loaded.

ninth-step.title: Potree Sidebar
ninth-step.description: The sidebar has some tools and inside each one of the following menus you are going to find these tools. If you hover the option, it will show you a tooltip with a description of each feature.

tenth-step.title: Application status
tenth-step.description: And then, here is the application status wich changes according to the files tab functionalities.
